name: OtherCharge
description: Other Charge details from AWB as per bullet point 19 - data element 23 from AWB

columns.name: chargePaymentType
columns.description: Indicates if charge is prepaid or collect (P; C)

columns.name: entitlement
columns.description: Entitlement code to define if charges are Due carrier (C) or Due agent (A). Refer to CXML Code List 1.3

columns.name: otherChargeCode
columns.description: Refer to CargoXML Code List 1.2 for Other Charges
